ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Hunting Guide?
ygData.msgSnippet: I got levels 14-20 in Oasis, but that was long before the major overcrowding problems there. I would recommend levels 15-24 in Highpass.  It s definitely
ygData.messageBody:
I got levels 14-20 in Oasis, but that was long before the major overcrowding
problems there.

I would recommend levels 15-24 in Highpass. It's definitely doable. Some
things were still blue to me at level 26 there (fanatics, mercenaries, and
the named orcs), and the loot is pretty good. Lots of ringmail, and a shop
within a short distance to sell at. You can also get the Shralok Pack from
Recfek Shralok, which is a 8 slot 25% weight reduction pack. It's pending
lore, but it's been that way for months. Handy thing to have.

-Raean Bloodyhands, soon to be 28th rank
-Sifu of the Fists of Fury
-Tunare


> From: "Currey, Mick" <mick_currey@...>
>
> Hail all you experienced monks out there.
>
> What recommendations does everyone have for places to hunt solo by levels?
>
> My character is only level 21, but here were his favorites so far>
>
> Level Area Hunted
> 1-4 Freeport
> 5-10 Rivervale (with runnyeye bead quest)
> 11-12 Black Burrow (with gnoll teeth quest)
> 13-16 Wisp island (gls quest, good money and exp!)
> 17-18 EK (gnoll reavers)
> 19-20 HH (gnolls solo and orcs in a group)
> 21-22? Gorge hunting mino's
> 22+? Not there yet............1 bubble to go!
>
> The quests seem to really speed up the leveling. Has anyone else found
that
> to be true also? Are they any good quests out there for experience once
in
> the twenties and beyond?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Thors Blazingfury, Level 21, Tunare
>
>
>
>
